entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
